name: Exanima
description: Explore, fight, survive and unravel mysteries in this unique and unforgiving 3D isometric RPG set in an original dark, low fantasy world. Exanima's exceptional attention to detail and realistic simulation of all things aim to provide a deeply immersive and dynamic gameplay experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3) Processor: Intel Core2 or AMD Athlon II dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or AMD Radeon HD 2600 or Nvidia GeForce 8600 with 512MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated audio Additional Notes: Wine / CrossOver compatible on Mac OS X or Linux with appropriate OpenGL driver
recommended_requirements: Processor: 3 Ghz Intel Core i5 quad core or 3.5 Ghz AMD FX hex core or better Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5850 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 280 with 1GB VRAM or better Additional Notes: Faster GPU with more VRAM recommended for very high settings or resolutions
